author: Rich
content: It would only matter if you were a photojournalist and your picture was meant to be an accurate record of events and you were presenting it as an accurate record of events. Anything else doesn't matter - do what you want. If it stands up as a picture and you can't see the photoshopping, then that's fine. There's too much precious crap talked about photography. No one asks a painter if he considered putting a figure in here or altering a perspective there.
